====================
Needed Test Material
====================

Needed Subpacket Examples
-------------------------

* Reserved (0x00)

* Reserved (0x01)

* Reserved (0x08)

* Reserved (0x0D)

* Reserved (0x0E)

* Reserved (0x0F)

* Reserved (0x11)

* Reserved (0x13)

* Signature Target (0x1F)


Needed Packet Examples
----------------------
* Signature Packet (Tag 2):

   - type 0x02 - Standalone signature

   - type 0x40 - Timestamp signature
     This one looks to be difficult to obtain as

   - type 0x50 - Third-Party Confirmation signature
